attributes.action: State to the public exactly why the gyms and leisure facilities should shut.
attributes.additional_details: Give the public of UK evidence and state why gyms and leisure centres have to close during lockdown.
attributes.background: Discuss the reasons and state factual evidence why the gyms and leisure facilities should be closing although being unable to supply any evidence that gyms and leisure facilities are better off being closed than open during lockdowns.

rejection.details:
The Government has already published advice from SAGE about the risks of Covid-19 transmission in various locations, including gyms: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/925856/S0770_NPIs_table__pivot_.pdf#page=8

If you want gyms to be kept open you might like to sign the following petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
